                                                   int end)

        Parameters:

        start - The beginning, e.g. 3
        end - The end, e.g. 6
        Returns:
        The return, e.g. blafoobla

      • lastPositionOf

        public static int lastPositionOf(java.lang.String string,
                                 java.lang.String key,
                                 int endSearch)

        Parameters:

        key - The keyString.
        endSearch - The last position.
        Returns:
        The position of 0 if not found.

      • getStringBetween

        public static java.lang.String getStringBetween(java.lang.String target,
                                                java.lang.String front,
                                                java.lang.String rear)
        Return a string surrounded by two other strings.
        Parameters:
        target - The containing string, e.g. "bla[[foo]]bar".
        front - The front trigger, e.g. "[[".
        rear - The rear trigger, e.g. "]]".
        Returns:
        The contained String (if any), e.g. "foo" or null if not found

      • getStringBetween

        public static java.lang.String getStringBetween(java.lang.String target,
                                                java.lang.String front,
                                                java.lang.String[] rears)
        Get the string between two other strgins, where the back string will be chosen from an array of possible string, and selecting the shortest possibility.
        Parameters:
        target - The target, e.g. "asda bla blobli foo faa ; asd"
        front - The first string, e.g. "bla"
        rears - The back possibilites, e.g. {"foo", ";", "faa"}
        Returns:
        e.g. " bloblo " or null if not found.

        Returns:
        The result, e.g. "sample bla what "

        Parameters:
        query - The query, e.g. "foo fong bar fong"

        The result, e.g. "foo bar"

        Parameters:
        query - The query, e.g. "foo Fong bar fong"
        stopwords - The stopwords, e.g. "fong"
        Returns:
        The result, e.g. "foo Fong bar"

      • replaceAll

                                          java.lang.String orig,
                                          java.lang.String replace)

        Parameters:
        input - The input, e.g. "bar foof bla foo bong."
        orig - The String to be replaced, e.g. "foo"
        replace - The replacement, e.g. "foobar"
        Returns:
        The result, e.g. "bar foobarf bla foobar bong."
